text: Timo Antero Kotipelto (born 15 March 1969) is the vocalist of the Finnish power metal band Stratovarius and is the creator and vocalist of the power metal band Kotipelto. ==Discography== ===With Stratovarius=== *Fourth Dimension (1995) *Episode (1996) *Visions (1997) *Visions of Europe (Live, 1998) *Destiny (1998) *The Chosen Ones (Compilation, 1999) *Infinite (2000) *Infinite Visions (DVD, 2000) *Intermission (2001) *Elements, Pt. 1 (2003) *Elements, Pt. 2 (2003) *Stratovarius (2005) ===Solo=== *Waiting For The Dawn (2002) :"Beginning" (2002) - single *Coldness (2004) :"Reasons" (2004) - single :"Take Me Away" (2004) - single *Serenity (2007) :"Sleep Well" (2006) - single ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1969 births Category:Living people
title: Timo Kotipelto
